pr_title: [TE] Creating a thirdeye-dashboard module to host the dashboard server

timeline.message:
[TE] Moved Test classes from thirdeye-pinot to thirdeye-dashboard

Updated poms. Moved shaded jar to dashboard module

timeline.bodyText: Per our discussion, we are going to publish shaded JAR and source JAR together. We should only remove this plugin once we have both JAR build.
timeline.author: vincentchenjl

replies.bodyText: The shading is moved to the thirdeye-dashboard.
replies.author: suvodeep-pyne

timeline.message:
[TE] Moved Resource classes to a new module thirdeye-dashboard

Project compiles. Tests do not compile.

[TE] Moved Test classes from thirdeye-pinot to thirdeye-dashboard

Some of the tests can be moved back. However, doing a blanket move in the interest of time. The test code contains a lot of dependencies on the UI code and therefore spliting it out will involve some effort.

[TE] Moved Test classes from thirdeye-pinot to thirdeye-dashboard

Updated poms. Moved shaded jar to dashboard module

Moving thirdeye-pinot/config/ to thirdeye-dashboard

Altering bash scripts to load from the dashboard module instead of thirdeye-pinot
